entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
